transcript_chunks.text: a new gaming handheld is coming out right now and it's got some pretty cool games so let me tell you about some of my favorites on the play date crankin presents time travel adventures is entirely played with the crank you control crankin who's always late for a date the goal is to fast forward and rewind time to dodge obstacles and make it to crank it as quickly as possible demon quest 85 is an 80s low bit visual novel where you'll summon demons with your classmates it's as wacky as it sounds but figuring out how to summon each demon is where the fun is snack is the classic snake game you know and love with a few added tweaks as you're trying to eat the apples they're trying to eat you so you need to stay ahead by playing quick and smart there's also a jump button which adds some strategy as well as difficulty selection executive golf is a golf game where you try to climb an office building if you like quirky golf games and who doesn't you'll dig this one omaze is a puzzle game where

as well as difficulty selection executive golf is a golf game where you try to climb an office building if you like quirky golf games and who doesn't you'll dig this one omaze is a puzzle game where you solve circular mazes it starts off easy but be sure that you're into puzzles as this one ramps up and quickly becomes a mind bender our review is up right now so go check that out but in short
